document_data.name: Death Heart
document_data.mainbody: '''Death Heart''', formerly known as the '''Heart of the Void''', was a city located within one of the major doldrums of the [[Negative Energy plane]]. Considered a nexus of [[evil]] and [[undeath]], it was largely unexplored by outsiders, with even the [[Doomguard]] and [[Dustmen]] fearing it. It was also considered to be one of the most stable locations within that [[plane]].
document_data.Description: This city had many tall spired structures, plazas, squares, streets, and fountains. It stood within a metal sphere that was {{SI|1|mile|long=yes}} in diameter, protecting the city from the baneful [[negative energy]] of the plane it floated in.
document_data.Inhabitants: Death Heart was entirely inhabited by a wide variety of undead creatures. Most notably, several [[lich]]es and powerful [[vampire]]s claimed this place as their home.
document_data.Rumors & Legends:
Some rumors claimed that this city was home to many of the most foul creatures of the [[multiverse]].

Rumors propagated by the [[mercane]] claimed that a vampiric [[minotaur]] brokered a peace among the various factions in Death Heart, encouraging further research into the nature of both the city and the Negative Energy plane.

The mercane who propagated these rumors speculated that the vampiric minotaur sought to one day steer the city into another plane and wreak havoc with the city's undead.
